Study_Abroad_OfferingObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Study_Abroad_OfferingObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Study_Abroad_Offering_Data.description: Wrapper element for the Has Academic Unit Data which contains an Academic Unit and Academic Level

validation.validation: Academic Level is required.
Only a single academic level is allowed.
The Academic Unit is not valid for the selected Academic Level.

Academic_PeriodObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: The selected Start Date is before the Academic Period Start Date.
The selected End Date is after the Academic Period End Date.

Study_Abroad_Offering_Data.description: The Activity Offering Data Has Academic Period Data holds the Academic Period, Activity Offering Start and the Activity Offering End Date for the Orientation Offering

validation.validation: End Date cannot be before the Start Date.
You can't specify a different Start Date.
To modify the End Date, specify a date that is in the future and ensure that the offering has not yet started or been published.

Course_Section_Other_Credit_Type_Value_D.description: References Other Credit Type for Course Section

validation.validation: Other Credit Values must be true in order to submit an Other Credit Type and value combination.

Course_Section_Other_Credit_Type_Value_D.description: Specifies the Value for an Other Credit Type on Course Section

Has_Billable_Load_Status_Data.description: Contains data for Other Credit Type Values for Course Section

validation.validation: You must specify at least 1 Other Unit Type and Other Unit Value when you select the Other Unit Values check box.

Student_Eligibility_RuleObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: You cannot use an eligibility rule with the qualifier, "has earned grades in academic period."
You must enter an active eligibility rule.
You must enter an eligibility rule that can be used for Course Definitions and Course Section Definitions.
Must select the Billable Activity Behavior to submit Billable Data.
Must select the Enrollable Activity Behavior to submit Enrollable Data.
Study Abroad Offerings require a Study Abroad to be valid.  This Web Service operation is only available for Web Service versions on or after v30.0.
Academic Level must match the Academic Level defined for the Student Activity Reference.
Academic Unit must match the Academic Unit defined for the Student Activity Reference.
To submit an Eligibility Rule, you must submit a new Activity and select "Enrollable & Eligible" on the Activity Behavior.
